definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to lay bare/to come to light
detailed and nothing left out (idiom); meticulous and comprehensive/not missing an iota
to show in full light/to be revealed in its entirety

sentences.english: His wild ambition was thoroughly exposed.
sentences.chinese: 他的狼子野心暴露無遺。

sentences.english: I certainly did . The sky was very clear, and we could see for miles and miles.
sentences.chinese: 當然有，天空十分晴朗，我們可以一覽無遺。
你的詭計已暴露無遺了。

sentences.english: Do you chat with people in the hallways and reveal your own weaknesses to them?
sentences.chinese: 你會在走廊與人閒聊，還把自己的弱點都暴露無遺嗎？

sentences.english: His evil intentions were manifest and yet we could not stop him.
sentences.chinese: 譯他的險惡用心表露無遺，但是我們卻沒辦法阻止他。

sentences.english: The clues to solving them are all around, hidden in plain sight.
sentences.chinese: 解謎的線索到處都是，藏在我們能夠一覽無遺的地方。

sentences.english: JANG Hyuk is basking in happiness and it shows.
sentences.chinese: 張赫正沉浸在幸福中，這一點現在已表露無遺。

sentences.english: Cheng hai ambitions are exposed, millions of heroes list but is a conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 程海的野心暴露無遺，百萬英雄榜不過是一場陰謀。

sentences.english: The learning without effort, the old time before.
sentences.chinese: 古人學問無遺力，少壯工夫老始成。

sentences.english: Lest one touch of this heart convey its grief.
sentences.chinese: 生怕心觸及，哀傷現無遺。

sentences.english: Second, write it down, to externalize it.
sentences.chinese: 第二，把它記下來，讓它暴露無遺。

sentences.english: We've taken control every time we've had a chance to, but not without regrets.
sentences.chinese: 我們控制了每一個選擇，但是也不無遺憾。

sentences.english: And then there is the sheer joy, etched so openly on the musicians' faces.
sentences.chinese: 樂師們臉上有種表露無遺的純粹快樂。

sentences.english: The scale of the cruelty to which Baby P had been subjected became apparent at the postmortem examination.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒P所遭受的殘酷虐待在驗屍中顯露無遺。

sentences.english: And his determined and competitive spirit was already apparent at that young age.
sentences.chinese: 他的決心和好強在那麼小的年紀就已經顯露無遺。
